resources.string: YesGraph Boosts Your App\'s Viral Growth
Welcome to YesGraph\'s example app! We\'ll show you how you grow faster and how YesGraph works.\n\nYou can try ourSDK just by clicking \"Try YesGraph\" anytime.

YesGraph can recommend exactly who you should invite. We do this with machine learning and data crunching.

 1.Our flow uses industry best practises.

 2.Save engeneering time and focus on your app.

 3.Improve your virality metrics, like conversion rate and # invites sent.

 4.Personalized suggestions make for a better user experience.

 5.Our SDK is easy to itegrate

YesGraph learns the patterns in your app automatically using past successful invitations to train a filter. We extract features about what kind of relationships and people are good for your app.

 What mightwe look for? Here are some examples.

 Phone number area codes contain some location information, and some apps send invites to people in your same town.

 B2B apps often involve collaboration with coworkers, so having the matching email domain matters.
YesGraph\'s SDK can power your invite flow. Try it out if you haven\'t already!
We have example application on Github.\n
<font color="#ACADAF">You\'ll need a YesGraph account. <font color="#0078BD">Sign up and create an app to configure the SDK</font>.\n\n
<font color="#ACADAF">The documentation online is extensive, but if you have any trouble, email <font color="#0078BD">support@yesgraph.com.</font>\n\n
